name: LaTeX Workshop
description: Installs Tex Live latex compiler with tlmgr package manager, alongside LaTeX Workshop extension

scheme.description: Gives the option select which scheme is used to install Tex Live. See https://www.tug.org/texlive/doc/texlive-en/texlive-en.html#x1-340003.4.2 for more information.

packages.description: Comma separated list of packages to install with tlmgr. See https://www.tug.org/texlive/doc/tlmgr.html#installing-packages for more information.

mirror.description: Provide a custom mirror to use for the installation of Tex Live. Omit option to automatically select the mirror closest to you.
